body_html:
Here is a monkey patching module based on PR #2737

resize_image_patch.py

Note

  • Remember to pass argument dynamic_shape=True
  • Input image must have static rank of 3. This can be done by tf.Tensor.set_shape([None, None, None])
body_text:
Here is a monkey patching module based on PR #2737
resize_image_patch.py
Note

Remember to pass argument dynamic_shape=True
Input image must have static rank of 3. This can be done by tf.Tensor.set_shape([None, None, None])
body:
Here is a monkey patching module based on PR https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/2737

[resize_image_patch.py](https://gist.github.com/gaohuazuo/4093eee2aee4d5b8746bff698506ee57#file-resize_image_patch-py)

**Note**
- Remember to pass argument `dynamic_shape=True`
- Input image must have static rank of 3. This can be done by `tf.Tensor.set_shape([None, None, None])`
